name: libxcomposite

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
libXcomposite - client library for the Composite extension to the X11
protocol.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: libx11
dependencies.description: libX11 - Core X11 protocol client library.

dependencies.name: libxfixes
dependencies.description:
This package contains header files and documentation for the XFIXES
extension. Library and server implementations are separate.

dependencies.name: fixesproto
dependencies.description:
X Fixes Extension. The extension makes changes to many areas of the
protocol to resolve issues raised by application interaction with core
protocol mechanisms that cannot be adequately worked around on the
client side of the wire.

dependencies.name: compositeproto
dependencies.description:
Composite Extension. This package contains header files and
documentation for the composite extension. Library and server
implementations are separate.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: util-macros
dependencies.description:
This is a set of autoconf macros used by the configure.ac scripts in
other Xorg modular packages, and is needed to generate new versions of
their configure scripts with autoconf.

dependent_to.name: libcanberra
dependent_to.description:
libcanberra is an implementation of the XDG Sound Theme and Name
Specifications, for generating event sounds on free desktops, such as
GNOME.

dependent_to.name: motif
dependent_to.description:
" Motif - Graphical user interface (GUI) specification and the widget
toolkit

dependent_to.name: compiz
dependent_to.description:
compiz - OpenGL window and compositing manager. Compiz is an OpenGL
compositing manager that use GLX_EXT_texture_from_pixmap for binding
redirected top-level windows to texture objects. It has a flexible plug-
in system and it is designed to run well on most graphics hardware.

dependent_to.name: qt
dependent_to.description: Qt is a comprehensive cross-platform C++ application framework.

dependent_to.name: icedtea
dependent_to.description:
The IcedTea project provides a harness to build the source code from
https://openjdk.java.net/ using Free Software build tools and adds a
number of key features to the upstream OpenJDK codebase. IcedTea
requires an existing IcedTea or OpenJDK install to build.

dependent_to.name: scrot
dependent_to.description:
scrot (SCReenshOT) is a simple command line screen capture utility that
uses imlib2 to grab and save images. Multiple image formats are
supported through imlib2's dynamic saver modules.

dependent_to.name: xcompmgr
dependent_to.description:
xcompmgr is a sample compositing manager for X servers supporting the
XFIXES, DAMAGE, RENDER, and COMPOSITE extensions. It enables basic eye-
candy effects.
